column1: What are we looking for?
We are looking for a Performance Data Analyst. will be responsible for analyzing the solar plant data and proposing solutions to improve the Solar plants' reliability
What challenges will you face?
Use big data to analyze and troubleshoot low-performance issues with short and long-term impacts.
Manger and improve the KPIs of availability and performance ratio for the operating contracts.
Identify performance issues using our data analytics tools and provide feedback for their improvement
Define daily maintenance priorities.
Remotely collaborate with operations staff at the plant to fix issues with the highest efficiency possible
Lead weekly performance meetings to review fixed problems
Use big data tools to automate and improve processes that impact the operating plants
What specific knowledge do you require?
Minimum of 5 years of experience with knowledge in big data analytics and O&M preferably in the energy sector.
Bachelor of Data Science or Engineering degree
Advanced knowledge of Python programming and big data tools.

column1: Job Purpose and Impact

The Analytics Data Process Analyst will develop an in depth understanding of the business to innovate significant data driven insights to help business leaders make better decisions and will develop and combine subject matter expertise in key data domains. Our aim is to empower the business to unlock value from data assets
column2: uplift analytical capabilities and support data-driven decision making across the organization. In this role
column3: you will act as a partner with internal stakeholders and technical staff to execute a business technology strategy that delivers reporting and analytics solutions. You will work closely with business teams to help explore how data and analytics solutions can address business needs. Together with business and technical stakeholders at the group
column4: functional and regional level you will co-create and deliver data and analytics solutions.

column1: Key Accountabilities
Identify and analyze business needs
column2: gather requirements and define the scope and objectives to drive business decisions.

column1: Prepare data and explore new potential data to support reporting and analysis initiatives.
Prepare reports and analysis to identify
column2: analyze and interpret trends or patterns in complex data sets for values and new opportunities.

column1: Lead analysis in collaboration with process and operations leadership to identify the top opportunities for improvement and track progress and impact on future results.
Mentor and coach peers and recommend process improvements related to delivery and new methodologies.
Partner with the team to develop a detailed understanding of the business and offer mentorship or technical solutions to identify business problems.
You will work under minimal supervision and independently handle complex issues while referring only the most complex issues to higher-level staff.
Help drive the adoption of new data and analytics solutions within our businesses and coach users to analyze and access data via various data and analytics tools.
Other duties as assigned
Qualifications
MINIMUM QUALIFICATIONS
Bachelor’s degree in a related field or equivalent experience
Minimum of four years of related work experience
Business acumen and the ability to partner and communicate effectively with business counterparts
Experience in translating business requirements into data solutions
Experience with data analytics tools and applications
Experience in extracting data from databases and other applications
Applied experience with data process mapping and business analysis
Fluent English is mandatory
Preferred Qualifications
Certification in programming language or business intelligence tools
Confirmed skills querying relational databases with query language
Confirmed experience working with large data stores
Experience with the Agile mindset

column1: Venha fazer parte do time mais tecnológico do mercado segurador!
/ Como fazemos acontecer:
Somos movidos por tecnologia
column2: inovação e criatividade! Valorizamos a curiosidade e a busca constante pelo aperfeiçoamento
column3: desenvolvimento e conhecimento. Para transformar e melhorar a nós mesmos e ao nosso negócio
column4: gostamos de pensar fora da caixa ao entender problemas

column1: Não esperamos que as coisas aconteçam
column2: fazemos as coisas acontecerem. Temos atitude proativa e focamos nossos esforços para melhorar processos e desenvolver pessoas
column3: buscando sempre a excelência em nossa entrega.

column1: Acreditamos no trabalho colaborativo e praticamos a empatia em tudo que fazemos! Somos um time
column2: que constrói relacionamentos sólidos e valoriza as ideias e opiniões uns dos outros.

column1: Tomamos decisões e agimos como donos do negócio. Acreditamos que todos podem ter um impacto positivo significativo
column3: independentemente de cargos e posições hierárquicas. Você será o protagonista da sua história!

column1: Sempre fazemos o que é certo. Agir com integridade e dentro dos mais altos padrões éticos é inegociável e não toleramos nada menos do que isso.
Nossa rotina é intensa
column2: queremos transformar o mercado segurador com soluções inovadoras e nosso sucesso é o sucesso de nossos clientes. Trabalhamos com o cliente e para o cliente
column3: pois só é valioso para nós se for valioso para eles.

column1: / Seja o protagonista com a I4PRO! Contamos com você para:
Ser responsável por atividades e projetos de desenvolvimento de novas funcionalidades dentro do seu módulo
column2: assim como suporte de bugs abertos pelo cliente para correções.

column1: Contribuir para o planejamento da estrutura dos projetos e suportes para entendimento das atividades a ele designadas
column2: compartilhando ideias ou propondo ações que viabilizem a conclusão do projeto.

column1: Atuar com desenvolvimento de artefatos em SQL
Seguir e aplicar os padrões de especificações
column2: desenvolvimento e qualidade (governança) estabelecida pela empresa.

column1: Desenvolver testes unitários (TDDs).
Garantir o cumprimento do cronograma e atendimento ao cliente conforme prazos acordados e estipulados com sua liderança.
Gerar evidências e documentação do desenvolvimento efetuado
column2: bem como ser responsável por acompanhar as homologações e testes de seus desenvolvimentos.

column1: Auxiliar tecnicamente os desenvolvedores juniores em relação as ferramentas de desenvolvimento.
/ O que é necessário para ser um I4PRO:
Formação Superior em cursos de tecnologia e/ou áreas correlacionadas.
Conhecimentos sólidos em Lógica de programação.
Conhecimentos sólidos em Linguagem SQL.
Conhecimentos básicos na ferramenta Visual Studio.
Forte experiência em atividades de desenvolvimento.
Conhecimento básico em metodologia ágil.
/ E os diferenciais:
Inglês.
Atuação no mercado de seguros
Desejável conhecimento de Linguagem C#.
/ Nosso escritório:
Estamos na Avenida Angélica
(Atualmente

- Vale Refeição.
- Vale Alimentação – aquela ajudinha para complementar as compras do mês;
- Horário flexível – porque equilíbrio é tudo nessa vida;
- Plano Médico Sulamérica - um cuidado especial pra sua saúde;
- Gympass;
- Vale Transporte
- Auxílio Creche – momentos importantes da sua vida
- Participação nos Lucros e Resultados – nosso sucesso é o seu sucesso e merece ser reconhecido;
- Seguro de Vida – disso a gente entende né?
- Previdência Privada – somos visionários
column3: prezamos pelo seu futuro e investimos uma parte na sua contribuição.

column1: Job Purpose and Impact

column1: Prepare data and explore new potential data to support reporting and analysis initiatives.

column1: Lead analysis in collaboration with process and operations leadership to identify the top opportunities for improvement and track progress and impact on future results.

Qualifications
MINIMUM QUALIFICATIONS
Bachelor’s degree in a related field or equivalent experience

Applied experience with data process mapping and business analysis
Fluent English is mandatory
Preferred Qualifications

Applied experience with Data Warehousing concepts (e.g. dimensional modelling) and the use of traditional RDBMS;
Experience with the Agile mindset
Experience with Alteryx

Empenhamos todos os esforços para contribuir com a sociedade por meio de inovações e serviços que vão além do tratamento e da distribuição de água e esgotamento sanitário. Nossa paixão é tornar cada dia melhor tanto o ambiente que oferecemos a nossos colaboradores

column1: Programa Respeito dá o Tom
O programa nasceu com a meta de espelhar a demografia da população brasileira no quadro de funcionários da empresa.
A partir de 2020 passou por uma revisão e seu objetivo foi reconfigurado: espelhar a população negra em todos os níveis hierárquicos.
Em 2022 a Aegea emitiu um título sustentável atrelado a metas que incluem alcançar 45% de mulheres e 27% de negros em cargos de liderança até 2030
column2: sendo pioneira em se comprometer com meta de diversidade racial em cargos de liderança.

column1: DESCRIÇÃO
A GENIALE PROMOÇÃO DE EVENTOS E MERCHANDISING está buscando um Analista de BI para se juntar ao nosso time dinâmico e colaborativo. Como Analista de BI
column2: você será responsável pela análise e coleta de dados usando a plataforma Power BI. Sua expertise técnica e habilidades analíticas serão essenciais para o sucesso da equipe de BI da Geniale.

column1: O candidato ideal trará para o cargo uma sólida compreensão dos princípios de Business Intelligence e como aplicá-los para atingir os objetivos da empresa. Você será responsável por criar análises de dados de qualidade e dar suporte proativo em todos os aspectos dos relatórios de BI. Sua habilidade em apresentar essas informações em relatórios fáceis de ler e em visualizações atrativas será fundamental para este cargo.
Para ter sucesso neste trabalho
column2: você deve ter uma compreensão sólida das ferramentas básicas de análise de dados
column4: e ter um forte conhecimento do Power BI. Além disso
column5: você deve ter excelente habilidade em interpretar dados
column6: juntamente com habilidades de comunicação excepcionais. Você terá que ser capaz de trabalhar bem em equipe e de gerenciar de forma efetiva o seu tempo e projetos.

column1: Principais Responsabilidades Incluem

Experiência anterior em Business Intelligence
Habilidade excepcional em Power BI e outras ferramentas de análise de dados
Habilidade para trabalhar em equipe e capacidade de gerenciar vários projetos simultaneamente
Excelente habilidade de análise de dados e capacidade de interpretar e apresentar informações de maneira clara e concisa
Forte habilidade de comunicação e capacidade de trabalhar com outras equipes
Capacidade de pensar ""fora da caixa"" e solucionar problemas de forma criativa

The Fraud & Risk Ops team's mission is to mitigate risks and reduce our losses. The team works by acquiring and gathering information about deviations and data that help us improve risk processes

column1: What you'll do:
Perform detailed investigations into potential fraud activities at the account and transaction level. Clearly document the results from these investigations and act as appropriate.
Review transaction monitoring and account level reporting including conducting research on possible linked accounts or users creating similar fraud risks.

Identify and compile trends allowing for detection model or rule adjustments and operational efficiency gains. Summarize and document findings with recommendations for data scientists and engineering.
Support the customer and merchant support groups by handling internal and external risk inquiries as the primary point of contact. Adjust risk settings of accounts and users per policy guidelines.
Document policies and procedures around risk management processes and systems. Generate new ideas and suggestions for continuous improvement of systems
column2: processes and procedures to enhance the company’s overall risk management.

column1: Create and maintain reporting on risk metrics and key performance indicators. Work with the analytics team to create data visualizations and reporting for the risk team.

Fraud/risk experience in the financial services industry preferably with some experience in payments or remittances.
Familiarity with fraud concepts such as account-take-over
Strong investigative capabilities and pattern recognition.
Understanding of the impact risk decisions can have on good customers and ability to take a balanced view of risk mitigation.
Experience creating playbooks and policy documentation for operational processes.
Advanced Microsoft Office or GSuite skills
Previous experience with SQL.
Ability to communicate fluently in English.

column1: Do you want to help change the world? Learn more about the role:
About The Role

To support our growth in Brazil we’re looking for a Senior Logistics Analyst to join our team. Your role will be to support the Brazilian Team to execute world-class logistics planning and management.
The Logistics Analyst is responsible for daily execution of the order to cash process. This position requires heavy computer work

column1: Responsibilities
Participate in customer contract reviews and ensure we adhere to contractual obligations where appropriate.
Manage global distributions centers (DC’s) to ensure orders are being processed in a timely manner and customer shipping windows are met.
Work closely with Distribution Centers (DC’s) to resolve demand and shipment capability conflicts.
Track and monitor end to end Fulfillment process and execute critical activities related to transacting customer shipments.
Heavy use of Oracle functionality Available to Promise (ATP) process to ensure proper alignment of supply/demand in meeting customer promised scheduled ship dates.
Manage accounts’ routing guide and stay up to date on new requirements regarding product related issues and shipping rules. This will require consistent follow up.
Work closely with finance to resolve any invoice related issues and ensure the month/qtr end processes are being followed.
Manage and execute monthly Cycle Counts and year-end Physical inventory.
Provide direct input into Supply Planner to ensure proper levels of supply are being met.
Work closely with Sales Operations in managing changes to open backlog
column4: and ensure bookings stay within DC capacity limits.

column1: Collection Analyst;{'name': 'SITA'
Overview
Collection Analyst
As Collection Analyst
column2: you will proactively work and support the invoice to cash process meaning that this position acts as the point of contact for all matters which relate to customer debt and billing.

column1: The role facilitates the accounts receivable activity to generate cash flow through cash collection in line with Credit Management best practice. Working closely with customers at a regional level the role ensures customer debt for the region is kept at or below corporate target levels. It also contributes to the overall satisfaction of the customers with the billing deliverables.
The world is changing. Are you ready to define with future of travel with us?
What You Will Do

To execute all debt collection activity for an assigned portfolio of customers in a dedicated region. To act as the single point of contact to the customer for the resolution of any issues or complaints around invoice validation or content and for the understanding of the invoices billing

To pro-actively contact customers regarding due payments and be responsible for prompt & accurate allocation of all customer payments received against outstanding invoices. To reconcile & agree disputes over SITA and customer invoice data. To carry out any required reconciliations of historical debts.

To work collaboratively with other SITA teams to resolve issues affecting cash collection / revenue recognition or raise issues which may impact on customer satisfaction. In particular to ensure that any problems which impact billing (e.g. contract
column4: or tax issues) are addressed promptly with the necessary parties to support resolution.

column1: To build relationships with customers to enable agreement of customer re-payment plans. To monitor and track progress on action plans. To manage process to suspend customer services in event of continued non-payment
column2: in line with SITA's agreed disconnection procedure and in accordance with SITA Credit Control Escalation Policy.

column1: To address customer satisfaction issues in the billing and payment areas. To undertake
column3: any training with customers on SITA's invoices
column5: and any other billing content and tools. Responsible to develop action plans after customers' surveys (e.g. CFF feedback on billing) or complaints (including escalations to Corporate level
column6: e.g. Orange or Red Alerts). To record and anticipate the business requirements of the customers and work on proposing solutions.

column1: To update any administrative data relating to customers (mailing address
column3: etc) in the Customer referential (e.g. CMS). Additionally
column4: to update the status of the customer's account to reflect the current escalation process.

column1: To keep data up-to-date for the production of any debt
column2: billing or customer satisfaction reports. To participate
column4: to any regional cash or billing calls or meetings.

column1: To act as a billing and payment process know-how point of contact for the Regions and Business Units. To this effect
column2: to keep her/his knowledge of SITA's products and services
column3: billing and payment processes up to date
column4: and to attend all training that is necessary to maintain her/his know-how.

column2: justiça e desenvolvimento de baixo carbono no Brasil. Funcionamos como uma ponte entre financiadores internacionais e nacionais e parceiros locais. Assim
column3: somos parte de uma ampla rede de organizações filantrópicas dedicadas à construção de soluções para a crise climática.

column1: O iCS traça planos de ação frente aos problemas climáticos a partir de uma lente social. Por isso
column3: além de reduzir as emissões de gases de efeito estufa (GEE)
column4: também gerem melhorias na qualidade de vida para a sociedade
column5: em especial para os mais vulneráveis.

column1: A atividade principal do Instituto é dar doações para fomentar projetos e organizações que visem:
CONSTRUIR evidências que qualifiquem o debate e apoiem a tomada de decisão
PROMOVER advocacy
CRIAR espaços de interação entre diversos atores e setores
INCENTIVAR o intercâmbio de conhecimento e experiência entre o Brasil e o mundo Além disso
column2: também nos dedicamos ao engajamento da sociedade com o tema de mudanças climáticas
column3: implementação de projetos próprios e capacitação institucional de organizações da sociedade civil.

column1: Description
A equipe de Planejamento de Rede de Transporte do time de países emergentes (ECCF) da Amazon está procurando um Business Analyst na função de Program Manager motivado (a)

column1: A função é responsável por se aprofundar nos dados e recomendar soluções para aprimorar a cadeia de logística. Influenciar uma das áreas de mais alta visibilidade/alto impacto na organização.

The customer support engineer will be responsible for the entire life cycle of the problem resolution process.

column3: service requests updates and proactive actions to prevent possible issues.

column3: the engineer should have the ability to conduct the analytical troubleshooting process in order to find out the root causes.

As a Principal Data Scientist at QuantumBlack you will work in multi-disciplinary environments harnessing data to provide real-world impact for organizations globally.

About Our Teams
Safety

The Safety team uses real-time telematics and motion sensing technologies along with multi-faceted machine learning algorithms and user-facing mobile products to reduce and prevent unsafe driving and behavior on the Uber platform! Our work touches all parts of the Uber experience from dispatch to on-trip and post-trip
column2: as well as Uber's entire ecosystem ranging from our rides business to other newer Uber marketplaces

column1: Customer Identity Platform (CIP)

column3: and identity management solutions which are used by Uber and its partners. Our services are highly scalable and serve up to 1M requests/sec. We support various identity use cases which span Uber's mobile and web applications
column5: Uber services offered through 3rd party applications as well as enabling our external partners to seamlessly offer their services within Uber apps.

column1: Trusted Identity

column4: intuitive and frictionless user experiences. Our continued obsession for innovation in the space is essential to ensure safety as people interact on Uber’s platform.

column1: Order Platform

Uber's Commerce Engineering group is responsible for maintaining and enhancing the infrastructure for orders and payments that enables all lines of businesses across Uber to conduct business. All commerce in and out of Uber flows through these mission-critical systems. In 2019 this meant processing over 6.9 billion trips with $65 billion in gross bookings! With strict 4 9’s availability requirements
column2: this is one of our largest scalable systems and the complex day-to-day interactions require careful coordination from engineers that have a deep sense of quality

column1: Uber for Business
Uber for Business is the strategy to focus on enterprise business
column2: while Uber Central is one of the fastest growing verticals under U4B. Uber Central’s vision is to help businesses keep their customers and guests moving with powerful features in one dashboard. We built a booking platform that supports several delegate booking use cases. We are aiming to expand central’s product to meet enterprises where they are by offering various transportation and delivery solutions and continue to evolve the delegate booking platform. As a tech lead on the backend system
column3: there are many opportunities to re-architect the system given these growing business needs.

column1: Background
Systemair has a history of solid growth and has continuously expanded its business through organic investments and M&A. To support continued profitable growth
column2: the Group is now looking to strengthen its corporate development function. The function is responsible for strategic outlooks
column5: company integration and organic business development initiatives such as growing the service business as well as establishing common processes and procedures for strategic pricing. Becoming more data driven in decision making about future growth opportunities is a key enabler in assuring efficient capital allocation and a proactive growth agenda. To support us in this journey we are now looking for a Corporate Development Analyst to join our team.

column1: Responsabilidades
Site Reliability Engineering (SRE) é uma disciplina de engenharia que combina engenharia de software e gerenciamento de sistemas para criar sistemas tolerantes a falhas
column2: distribuídos e em grande escala. É também uma mentalidade e um conjunto de abordagens de engenharia para construir e gerenciar sistemas em produção.

column1: O dia a dia de um SRE na Loggi é focado na construção de infraestrutura e ferramentas para que a equipe de engenharia possa focar no desenvolvimento de nossos produtos
column3: já que os SREs guiam a equipe de engenharia para terem uma visão geral de como nossos sistemas se relacionam entre si.

column1: A produção é o bem mais precioso da Loggi
column2: como SREs nosso objetivo é proteger a experiência de nossos usuários e para isso buscamos sempre os mais altos níveis de disponibilidade de nossos sistemas
column3: identificando falhas através de ""autópsias sem culpa"" criando um ciclo de melhoria que é a chave para entregar um produto com uma experiência incrível para nossos usuários.

column1: Como SRE
column2: você também é responsável por proteger os sistemas da Loggi
column3: fornecendo plataformas de segurança para gerenciamento de segredos

column1: The worldwide data management software market is massive (IDC forecasts it to be $138 billion by 2026!). At MongoDB we are transforming industries and empowering developers to build amazing apps that people use every day. We are the leading modern data platform and the first database provider to IPO in over 20 years. Join our team and be at the forefront of innovation and creativity.
MongoDB Technical Services Engineers use their exceptional problem solving and customer service skills
column2: along with their deep technical experience
column3: to advise customers and to solve their complex MongoDB problems. Technical Service Engineers are experts in the entire MongoDB ecosystem - database server
column5: cloud and infrastructure. This also includes services such as Atlas (database as a service)
column6: or Cloud Manager (which helps customers with automation
column7: backup and monitoring of their MongoDB systems). Our engineers combine their MongoDB expertise with passion
column9: teamwork and a great sense of humor to achieve exceptional results for our customers.

column1: We are looking to speak to candidates who are based in Sao Paulo for our hybrid working model.

MongoDB is on a mission to change the way people think about databases. Along the way

column3: it's our job to help these people.

column1: You'll be working alongside our largest customers
